title: Gaming On Apple Vision Pro - Highs and Lows
description: Apple Vision Pro doesn’t put games at the forefront, but really pushes the boundaries of what gaming is capable of on a VR headset. However, it's also lacking in some key areas, and has a few a couple of brain scratching decisions and absent features thrown into the mix.

title: Firearms Expert Reacts To The Last Of Us Part 2 Remastered’s Guns
description: Jonathan Ferguson, a weapons expert and Keeper of Firearms & Artillery at the Royal Armouries, breaks down the weaponry of The Last Of Us Part 2, including a reskinned semi-auto pistol, Tommy’s M1A rifle, and a cut gun from one of the remastered edition’s lost levels.
